MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW7 postcode area of Winsford affecting properties in Station Road, Fernbank Close, Dierden Street, Nunhouse Drive, Ribble Avenue and surrounding streets. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to works required by Cadent on the Gas Network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:08pm on 16th December 2020
